tool_description: Validates growth measurements against age-appropriate ranges and flags potential data entry errors or concerning values.
error_messages: Invalid age: Age must be between 0 and 240 months (20 years).
Invalid gender: Gender must be either 'male' or 'female'.
No measurements provided: At least one measurement must be provided for validation.
Out of range values: Measurements are extremely outside expected ranges for the given age.
usage: Input the child's age and gender along with measurements to validate. The tool checks against pediatric growth standards and flags unusual values.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result (valid, warning, or error)

height_valid.description: Whether height measurement is within expected range

weight_valid.description: Whether weight measurement is within expected range

head_circumference_valid.description: Whether head circumference is within expected range

warnings.description: List of validation warnings or concerns
